title: Senior Frontend for Unieuro
description:
[www.unieuro.it](http://www.unieuro.it)\
Front-end architecture of the new e-commerce site. I developed a new way to use page components and how they interact, so as to reduce duplicated code and increase maintainability.

Moreover, this is the first big project to use my own [jCreate](/portfolio/3/jcreate) library.\
<https://github.com/marcomontalbano/jquery-jcreate>
